author: Ben Popper
description: By far the biggest mobile operating system in the world
title: Google announces over 2 billion monthly active users on Android

author: Jacob Kastrenakes
description: It’s been two months since Google first announced Android O, but today’s the day we’re really learning about what’s inside the operating system’s next big update. Google says the big feature this...
title: Android O will focus on ‘vitals’ like battery life and speed, first beta launches today

author: Daniel Cooper
description: If you want a car with Android Auto built into the infotainment system, buy a next-generation Volvo or Audi.
title: Audi and Volvo go all-in on Android Auto

author: Michael Nunez
description: Today at the annual Google I/O developer conference, we learned about all the updates coming to the latest version of Google’s mobile operating system, dubbed Android O for now—at least until its official release later this year. This is the eighth version of the OS (Android 8.0), and even though we’ve seen some of the additions in the developer preview that launched in March, there’s a whole swath of new goodies that Google highlighted at the show. So, without further adieu, here are all the new updates coming to Android.
title: Everything New About Android From Google I/O

author: Axel Postinett
description: Auf der bevorstehenden Google-Hausmesse I/O wird die neue Version des Betriebssystems Android mit dem Codenamen „O“ beherrschendes Thema sein. Google will damit Boden gegenüber Apples iPhone gut machen.
title: Kolumne Future Lab: Google und die Operation Android

description: Einige Autobauer haben sich bislang gegen das Google-System Android Auto gewehrt, weil es zu viele Daten sammle. Audi und Volvo sehen das anders: Sie vertrauen künftig auf ein komplettes Betriebssystem auf Android-Basis.
title: Google-Betriebssystem: Audi stellt Android-Prototyp vor

author: FourFourTwo
description: Six weeks on from an operation on his left hip, Tottenham's Erik Lamela has had further surgery carried out on his opposite side.
title: Lamela has second hip operation

author: Andrew Cunningham
description: Android Go extends and continues past efforts to reduce resource usage.
title: “Android Go” will strip Android down for ultra-low-budget phones

author: Cameron Faulkner
description: The next Android update gets dissected
title: Android O release date and beta features

author: Joseph White
description: General Motors Co plans to quit selling vehicles in India by the end of this year and will sell operations in South Africa, the latest steps in a strategy of focusing cash and engineering effort on fewer, more profitable markets.
title: GM will cut operations in India, South Africa
